title: Amy Made Bobby Cry + Easy Trivia
itunes:title: Amy Made Bobby Cry + Easy Trivia
description:
Bobby cried watching Amy's video about her mother's cancer diagnosis and the birth of the 'Pimpin' Joy' movement. Show members share their Mt. Rushmore of musical artists. Bobby hosts another round of 'Easy Trivia'.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
